modName: Gromits Potions Heal Over Time Mod
summary: Health, Magicka and Stamina potions regenerate over a period of time, rather than just an instant heal. Potions created at the Alchemy table also feature the same affect.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FFA500][b][size=\"5\"]Potions Heal over time (3 secs) Version 1.1[/size][/b][/color]

Alters all restore health/stamina/magicka potions to regenerate over a period of 3 seconds rather than the default instant effect. Potions created at the Alchemy Table will behave in the same way also and remain balanced. 

This mod is designed to work alongside my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5877]Cooking Recipes, Food and Drink Overhaul[/url].

[color=#FFA500]Please Note:[/color]
Please note, the mod will not effect potions created prior to installing the mod.

This mod alters several ingredients to make the alchemy side of the mod work. Report any conflicts in the comments section please.

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]Revised Potion Weights[/b][/color][/size] 
Weights for all the potions have been altered and range from 0.1 to 0.8. The weights are based on the sizes of the actual bottles in game meaning the small potions such as water breathing weigh the least, whilst the larger ultimate potions will weight the most.

All Alchemy potions currently weigh in at 0.4 due to how the system for it works. Yes one potion controls the final weight of all crafted potions. 

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]Potion Effects List[/b][/color][/size] 

[color=#FFA500][b]Minor Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Restores 10 Health/Stamina/Magicka for 3 seconds (30 total)

[color=#FFA500][b]Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Restores 20 Health/Stamina/Magicka for 3 seconds (60 total)

[color=#FFA500][b]Plentiful Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Restores 30 Health/Stamina/Magicka for 3 seconds (90 total)

[color=#FFA500][b]Vigorous Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Restores 40 Health/Stamina/Magicka for 3 seconds (120 total)

[color=#FFA500][b]Extreme Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Restores 50 Health/Stamina/Magicka for 3 seconds (150 total)

[color=#FFA500][b]Ultimate Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Restores 100 Health/Stamina/Magicka for 3 seconds (300 total)

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]Combine Potions[/b][/color][/size] 

Combine health, magicka and stamina potions, as well as the element resistance potions at the cooking pot. There is a level requirement to unlock the recipes so no, you won\'t be able to combine all your minor potions at level 2. The level requirements are from the game\'s own basic leveled list for the potions appearing in game.

[color=#FFA500][b]Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Requires 2 minor potions of same type. Requires level 8

[color=#FFA500][b]Plentiful Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Requires 2 standard potions of same type. Requires level 16

[color=#FFA500][b]Vigorous Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Requires 2 plentiful potions of same type. Requires level 24

[color=#FFA500][b]Extreme Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Requires 2 vigorousl potions of same type. Requires level 32

[color=#FFA500][b]Ultimate Health/Stamina/Magicka Potions[/b][/color]
Requires 2 vigorousl potions of same type. Requires level 40

[color=#FFA500][b]Draught of Resist [element][/b][/color]
Requires 2 potions of resist of same type. Requires level 10

[color=#FFA500][b]Philter of Resist [element][/b][/color]
Requires 2 Draughts of same type. Requires level 20

[color=#FFA500][b]Elixir of Resist [element][/b][/color]
Requires 2 Philters of same type. Requires level 30

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][b]Installation Guide[/b][/size]
Unzip the file and extract it to your data folder.

====================================================================================================================================
